title: DC Problems
body:
As much as i'd like, this (sadly) isn't a post about DC comics/movies tying to league. here's to the ranty bit:

so I have all of these moments where I start leading into a game, but then I don't. the loading screen crashes and as I wait for 5 minutes I finally reconnect into a defeat screen. "that's fine, we remade (remaked?) b/c i was gone. makes sense," I say, as I click continue. i check the end results screen and see the big -20 lp, demotion, or series loss, simply because i've dc'd. I don't have the best of computers, and I know that i'm not the only one who crashes only to lose lp. there's gotta be some way riot can distinguish if someone leaves the game voluntarily or by dc'ing, and i want to know why they don't use it in their leaverbuster/ranking system. I want my lp back, and I know a lot of others do as well.
sorry for the ranty post, hope you guys agree.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, there no way for us to give you LP back or modify LP at all. The system is designed this way to prevent any sort of abuse. Additionally, due to the sheer essence of what a disconnection is, it's not possible for the system to determine why you've disconnected from a match, it only sees a disconnection.

The biggest reason disconnections happen are because of network settings that conflict with League. I highly encourage you to work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are 100% good. Let me know if you still encounter these issues after working through those steps.
